Package com.clanboards

Class CocClient

java.lang.Object
com.clanboards.CocClient
public class CocClient extends Object
Primary client for interacting with the Clash of Clans API. This client provides comprehensive access to clan data, player information, rankings, war logs, and league data. The client supports token rotation for high-throughput applications and includes built-in rate limiting to respect API constraints. Thread-safety: This class is thread-safe after login completion. Multiple threads can safely call API methods concurrently.
Since:
0.1.0
See Also:
  • Clash of Clans API Documentation

  • Constructor Details

    • CocClient

      public CocClient(HttpTransport transport, Authenticator authenticator)
      Creates a client with default API base URL and raw JSON disabled.
      Parameters:
      transport - HTTP transport implementation for making requests
      authenticator - authentication strategy for obtaining API tokens
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if transport or authenticator is null

    • CocClient

      public CocClient(HttpTransport transport, Authenticator authenticator, boolean rawAttribute)
      Creates a client with default API base URL and configurable raw JSON support.
      Parameters:
      transport - HTTP transport implementation for making requests
      authenticator - authentication strategy for obtaining API tokens
      rawAttribute - whether to attach raw JSON data to response objects
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if transport or authenticator is null

    • CocClient

      public CocClient(HttpTransport transport, Authenticator authenticator, String baseUrl)
      Creates a client with custom API base URL and raw JSON disabled.
      Parameters:
      transport - HTTP transport implementation for making requests
      authenticator - authentication strategy for obtaining API tokens
      baseUrl - custom base URL for API requests (useful for testing)
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any parameter is null

    • CocClient

      public CocClient(HttpTransport transport, Authenticator authenticator, String baseUrl, boolean rawAttribute)
      Primary constructor with full configuration options.
      Parameters:
      transport - HTTP transport implementation for making requests
      authenticator - authentication strategy for obtaining API tokens
      baseUrl - base URL for API requests
      rawAttribute - whether to attach raw JSON data to response objects
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if transport, authenticator, or baseUrl is null

  • Method Details

    • isRawAttributeEnabled

      public boolean isRawAttributeEnabled()
      Returns whether raw JSON attachment is enabled for response objects. When enabled, response objects will include the original JSON data for debugging or extended processing purposes.
      Returns:
      true if raw JSON is attached to response objects

    • login

      public void login(String email, String password)
      Authenticates with a single API token using default rate limiting. Uses the configured authenticator to obtain one token and sets up rate limiting at 10 requests per second.
      Parameters:
      email - developer account email
      password - developer account password
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if authentication fails
      RuntimeException - if authenticator encounters an error

    • login

      public void login(String email, String password, int tokenCount, int perTokenRate)
      Authenticates with multiple API tokens and configures rate limiting. Uses the configured authenticator to obtain the specified number of tokens and sets up rate limiting based on per-token request rates. Total rate limit is calculated as tokenCount * perTokenRate.
      Parameters:
      email - developer account email
      password - developer account password
      tokenCount - number of tokens to obtain (must be > 0)
      perTokenRate - requests per second per token (must be > 0)
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if authentication fails or no tokens obtained
      RuntimeException - if authenticator encounters an error

    • loginWithTokens

      public void loginWithTokens(List<String> tokens, int perTokenRate)
      Configures the client with pre-obtained API tokens. Bypasses the authentication process by using provided tokens directly. Useful when tokens are obtained through external means or cached.
      Parameters:
      tokens - list of valid API tokens (must not be null or empty)
      perTokenRate - requests per second per token (must be > 0)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if tokens is null or empty

    • getClan

      public Clan getClan(String tag)
      Retrieves comprehensive information about a clan by its tag. The tag is automatically corrected to standard format (uppercase, O->0 conversion, special character removal, # prefix addition).
      Parameters:
      tag - clan tag (e.g., "#2PP", "2pp", "2PP")
      Returns:
      clan information including name, level, member count
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      NotFoundException - if clan with the specified tag does not exist
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • searchClans

      public List<Clan> searchClans(String name, Integer limit)
      Searches for clans matching the specified criteria. At least one filter parameter must be provided. The search is performed against the clan name field and supports partial matching.
      Parameters:
      name - clan name to search for (partial matches supported)
      limit - maximum number of results to return (null for API default)
      Returns:
      list of clans matching the search criteria
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      IllegalArgumentException - if no valid filter criteria provided
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getMembers

      public List<ClanMember> getMembers(String clanTag, Integer limit, String after, String before)
      Retrieves the member list for a specified clan. Supports pagination through before/after cursors for large clans. The clan tag is automatically corrected to standard format.
      Parameters:
      clanTag - clan tag to get members for
      limit - maximum number of members to return (null for API default)
      after - cursor for pagination (members after this cursor)
      before - cursor for pagination (members before this cursor)
      Returns:
      list of clan members with basic profile information
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      NotFoundException - if clan with the specified tag does not exist
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer(String tag)
      Retrieves comprehensive information about a player by their tag. The player tag is automatically corrected to standard format. Returns detailed player statistics including town hall level, trophies, and other game progression data.
      Parameters:
      tag - player tag (e.g., "#2PP", "2pp", "2PP")
      Returns:
      player information and statistics
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      NotFoundException - if player with the specified tag does not exist
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • verifyPlayerToken

      public boolean verifyPlayerToken(String tag, String tokenToVerify)
      Verifies a player's API token for authentication purposes. This endpoint allows verification of player-generated tokens for secure API access and player identity confirmation.
      Parameters:
      tag - player tag to verify token for
      tokenToVerify - the token provided by the player to verify
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid for the specified player
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      NotFoundException - if player with the specified tag does not exist
      RuntimeException - if API request fails

    • getClanLabels

      public List<Label> getClanLabels()
      Retrieves all available clan labels from the API. Labels are used to categorize and filter clans based on various criteria such as clan type, requirements, or focus areas.
      Returns:
      list of all available clan labels
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getPlayerLabels

      public List<Label> getPlayerLabels()
      Retrieves all available player labels from the API. Labels help categorize players and can be used for filtering or organizational purposes.
      Returns:
      list of all available player labels
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • searchLocations

      public List<Location> searchLocations(Integer limit)
      Retrieves all available locations (countries and global) from the API. Locations are used for regional rankings and leaderboards. Includes both country-specific locations and the global location.
      Parameters:
      limit - maximum number of locations to return (null for no limit)
      Returns:
      list of available locations with country codes and names
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getLocation

      public Location getLocation(int id)
      Retrieves information about a specific location by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - location identifier
      Returns:
      location details including name and country information
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      NotFoundException - if location with the specified ID does not exist
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getLocationClanRankings

      public List<RankedClan> getLocationClanRankings(int locationId, Integer limit, String after, String before)
      Retrieves clan rankings for a specific location (main village). Returns clans ranked by their main village trophy count within the specified geographical location. Supports pagination.
      Parameters:
      locationId - location identifier for rankings
      limit - maximum number of ranked clans to return
      after - pagination cursor for results after this position
      before - pagination cursor for results before this position
      Returns:
      list of ranked clans with position and points information
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      NotFoundException - if location does not exist
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getLocationBuilderBaseClanRankings

      public List<RankedClan> getLocationBuilderBaseClanRankings(int locationId, Integer limit, String after, String before)

      Parameters:
      locationId - location identifier for rankings
      limit - maximum number of ranked clans to return
      after - pagination cursor for results after this position
      before - pagination cursor for results before this position
      Returns:
      list of ranked clans with builder base rankings
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      NotFoundException - if location does not exist
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getLeagueSeasons

      public List<SeasonRef> getLeagueSeasons(int leagueId, Integer limit, String after, String before)
      Retrieves available seasons for a specific league. Returns season identifiers that can be used to query historical ranking data for the specified league. Supports pagination.
      Parameters:
      leagueId - league identifier to get seasons for
      limit - maximum number of seasons to return
      after - pagination cursor for results after this position
      before - pagination cursor for results before this position
      Returns:
      list of season references with identifiers
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getLeagueSeasonInfo

      public List<RankedPlayer> getLeagueSeasonInfo(int leagueId, String seasonId, Integer limit, String after, String before)
      Retrieves player rankings for a specific league season. Returns historical ranking data showing player positions and trophy counts for the specified league and season combination.
      Parameters:
      leagueId - league identifier
      seasonId - season identifier (obtained from getLeagueSeasons)
      limit - maximum number of ranked players to return
      after - pagination cursor for results after this position
      before - pagination cursor for results before this position
      Returns:
      list of ranked players for the specified season
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getCurrentGoldPassSeason

      public GoldPassSeason getCurrentGoldPassSeason()
      Retrieves information about the current Gold Pass season. Returns details about the active Gold Pass including start/end dates, available rewards, and seasonal challenges.
      Returns:
      current Gold Pass season information
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getWarLog

      public List<ClanWarLogEntry> getWarLog(String clanTag, Integer limit)
      Retrieves the war log for a specified clan. Returns historical war data including results, opponents, and statistics. The clan's war log must be public for this endpoint to succeed.
      Parameters:
      clanTag - clan tag to get war log for
      limit - maximum number of war log entries to return
      Returns:
      list of war log entries with results and opponent information
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      PrivateWarLogException - if the clan's war log is private
      NotFoundException - if clan with the specified tag does not exist
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getCurrentWar

      public ClanWar getCurrentWar(String clanTag)
      Retrieves information about a clan's current war. Returns detailed information about the ongoing war including state, team sizes, attack counts, and participating members.
      Parameters:
      clanTag - clan tag to get current war for
      Returns:
      current war information with both clan and opponent details
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      PrivateWarLogException - if the clan's war information is private
      NotFoundException - if clan does not exist or has no current war
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getClanWarLeagueGroup

      public ClanWarLeagueGroup getClanWarLeagueGroup(String clanTag)
      Retrieves clan war league group information for a clan. Returns the current CWL group including participating clans, round structure, and war tags for accessing individual league wars.
      Parameters:
      clanTag - clan tag to get CWL group information for
      Returns:
      CWL group with participating clans and round information
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      PrivateWarLogException - if the clan's war league data is private
      NotFoundException - if clan does not exist
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getCwlWar

      public ClanWar getCwlWar(String warTag)
      Retrieves detailed information about a specific clan war league war. Uses a war tag obtained from the CWL group to fetch detailed war data including attack results, member participation, and final scores.
      Parameters:
      warTag - war tag identifier from CWL group rounds
      Returns:
      detailed CWL war information with attack data
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if client is not logged in
      PrivateWarLogException - if the war data is private or forbidden
      NotFoundException - if war with the specified tag does not exist
      RuntimeException - if API request fails or response parsing fails

    • getToken

      public String getToken()
      Returns the first available API token for diagnostic purposes. This method is primarily intended for debugging and monitoring. Returns null if the client is not logged in or no tokens are available.
      Returns:
      first API token or null if not logged in
